title: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, it currently results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: The expectation is to optimize the redraw process during text change with word wrap, so that appending N lines only triggers a single redraw of the affected area instead of redrawing the entire client area N times.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Enable word wrap mode for the StyledText.
2. Append N lines of text to the StyledText.
3. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times instead of a single redraw of the affected area.
